about_the_game:
You emerge in a cell, your head hurts and... you're not alone inside?

Split Brain is an asymmetrical cooperative puzzle game, where you and a friend share control of a single character, each with unique abilities and controls.
One player navigates the character while the other provides crucial information and guidance. Success hinges on effective communication and collaboration to overcome obstacles and avoid traps, guiding the character through Hexarture's prison.

The game must be played online and requires both players to communicate to each other.

Main features:
  • Asymmetrical control: within the same character, one controls movements, the other guides, you'll have to work together and communicate to escape Hexarture's prison.
  • Not just a prison.: to escape, you'll have to use your brains as well as your skill to face immersive and varied levels offering unique mechanics, challenges and thrills
  • A mystery to solve: How did you get into this situation? Will you have to live together for the rest of your life? Don't be afraid to face the depths of your soul and find the truth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A working PC-compatible microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A working PC-compatible microphone

short_description: Share the same body with a friend in Split Brain. One of you controls, the other one sees, but the decisions are made together! Face the illusion and uncover the truth to find your way out of Hexarture.
